chapters.title: Chapter 19: Memories
chapters.info: Basel Gill, p. 359 (254)—Innkeeper of The Queen's Blessing, an inn in Caemlyn. Rand and Mat stayed there while they passed through Caemlyn waiting for Moiraine and the rest of the group. It is also the inn where Morgase goes to take refuge from Gaebril. Gill is a loyal Queen's man, and is willing to do whatever he can for the rightful Queen of Andor.
